Resort_Leaving: I've got sand in my shoe...$s
Resort_Shore: I'm collecting seashells... I'm gonna make a necklace!
Resort: Aunt Marnie told me not to get burnt... But when I walk fast, it feels cool, so I think I'll be okay.$h
Mon: Oh...Are you looking for Aunt Marnie?$u
Mon4: Hi, Mr. @.^Hi, Ms. @.#$e#It's fun to live on a farm.$h
Tue6: You can play with my dolls if you want to. Just make sure to brush their hair when you're done.
Wed4: Aunt Marnie won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair!$s#$e#I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!
Thu: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers...$u
Thu2: Miss Laphi is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#She has such pretty handwriting.
Fri4: I like living on the farm... my favorite is the fresh ice cream from our cows' milk.
Sat2: Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt Marnie... but I fed one to a cow once.#$e#She loved it.
Sat8: You're always so nice to me, Mr. @$h^You're always so nice to me, Ms. @.$h#$e#Grown-ups are usually mean and boring, but you're different.
Sun: Um... d...do you want something?$u#$e#I'm not supposed to talk to strangers.$u
Sun2: Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.#$e#I'm thankful for all my toys.$h
Sun10: Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...they died.*sniff*$s
